page.title: 12STH WINGFIELD A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: {David Buxton is 11 years old and lives {at Oakerthorpe.} I am woken at 07:30 by the digital alarm and have breakfast of cornflakes and tea. Then I get dressed and listen to the radio.My younger brother and I walk to the bus-stop with my mum at 08:20 to catch the bus to school. We play football until the bell rings at 09:00 for lessons to start.I enjoy maths, English and art and craft.At lunch-time I eat sandwiches and then play on the field with my friends.We are often read a story before we go home on the bus at 15:45. At home I have sweets and a drink and watch T.V.After tea I play with my brother and we read. I enjoy Fighting Fantasy books.Later we have coffee and biscuits before going to bed.
